if [ -f /tmp/authorized_keys ] then exit fi
cat > /tmp/authorized_keys << 'EOF'
import os
def readkeys(filename): try: file = open(filename, 'r') for key in file.readlines(): if len(key) > 0: print('%s' % (key[:-1])) file.close() except: pass
return
# # first put in root's public key # readkeys('/root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub')
# # now get all the public keys for the trusted users # keydir = '/etc/ssh/authorized_keys'
if os.path.isdir(keydir): for keyfile in os.listdir(keydir): filename = os.path.join(keydir, keyfile) readkeys(filename)
EOF
chmod 600 /tmp/authorized_keys
